::Aerotaur::
       He shrugs idly.  "Whatever you say."  He takes a sip of his drink.  "I 
really can't say what their status is.  If you'll recall I was unconscious 
for most of the battle so I don't know who is still functioning properly, I 
left the Maximal base without going inside and the battle wasn't over.  So 
all I can tell you is that they're probably planning a frontal assault to 
recapture Night... Blackstorm.  You probably have a short time before they 
get themselves organized."  He tosses his head back and finishes his drink.  
"The fighting will be fierce but it shouldn't be anything we can't handle."

--part1_ae.3dc7b8a3.2bcf76e5_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
